scripts.css:csso: for f in web/app/themes/WordPressBP/assets/*.css; do csso $f $f; done
scripts.css:watch: watch 'npm run css:sass && npm run css:prefix'  web/app/themes/WordPressBP/css/ --wait=2 --ignoreDotFiles
scripts.js:uglify: for f in web/app/themes/WordPressBP/assets/*.js; do uglifyjs $f --screw-ie8 -o $f; done
scripts.build: npm run css:sass && npm run css:csso && npm run css:prefix && npm run js:bundle && npm run js:uglify
scripts.clean: if [ -d build ]; then rm -fr build; fi
scripts.predeploy: npm run clean && npm run build && shjs config/deploy/build.js
